headline.main: Sensitivity Training: A Workout for the Psyche and Emotions

docs.abstract: article on encounter groups (sensitivity training labs) which have become almost natl fad; session run by Amer Behavioral Science Training Labs discussed; sketch
docs.lead_paragraph: IN the late afternoon of a recent Sunday, 20 women checked into a dormitory of Finch College at 61 East 77th Street. They had journeyed from Park Avenue, Palm Beach, Acapulco, Toronto and Highland Park, Mich.
docs.snippet: IN the late afternoon of a recent Sunday, 20 women checked into a dormitory of Finch College at 61 East 77th Street. They had journeyed from Park Avenue, Palm Beach, Acapulco, Toronto and Highland Park, Mich.
